Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
13.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
18.05.2011 GB SCR16472 Changed value of parameters PI.USRID, PI.TEXT when
the BMQ005 is call
19.11.2010 SH SCR15970 Added initialization of text
22.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls BMQ001 by the BMQ005
-- Button OK pressed --> Save screen entries
-- Button Recall message pressed
-- Picture of bankaccount --> XX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Please send a feedback about way of handling')&ASCIIChr (13)&ASCIIChr (10)

Text.val: -- see remark in R.S.
-- If key 'Esc' pressed by USER or he starts an other program
-- directly over the menue out of this program, the following BLOCK
-- will be executed --> -- Ask USER for confirmation if he changed
-- data
-- If user changed something on screen, ask to save changes
-- Store first BDPD row with info who/when the legal text entered
-- Finally store MQ255 for legal department
-- Store possible entered text
... extract 80 characters from entered text
... store one BDPD row for every extracted string
... store dummy BADP row
... used to store MQ255
-- Store info who/when recalled the message

SQL_STMT_U.val: select MQDT_DEPT_CODE, MQDT_USRID, MQDT_MQTY_ID, MQDT_LINENO from :1/MQDT where MQDT_MQTY_ID = 255 and MQDT_DEBC_NO = :2 and MQDT_INVO_NO = :3 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Delete MQ255 for current payment
